properties.name: hdfswatcher.pseudoop
properties.description: Enable pseudo-operational mode (local file system instead of HDFS)

properties.name: hdfswatcher.local-storage-path
properties.description: Local storage path for pseudo-operational mode

properties.name: hdfswatcher.hdfs-paths
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HDFS paths to watch (e.g., '/policies,/documents,/reports')

properties.name: hdfswatcher.hdfs-path
properties.description: HDFS path to watch (deprecated: use hdfs-paths instead for multiple directory support)

properties.name: hdfswatcher.output-binding
properties.description: Output binding name for Spring Cloud Stream
